comments: You can only miss 3 days. What he goes over in class is exactly what your homework will be so do the homework while he goes over it so you will know how to do it. Homework isn\'t due for 2 weeks after he assigns it. Come to class, pay attention, do the work, and it\'s an A. He will make you feel stupid when you ask questions though. I liked his class
BEST TEACH BY FAR EVER HE HAD A GREAT WAY OF BEING CORNY LOLZ BUT OVERALL ONE THE BEST AT CGTC.

i loved mr wallace. yes there was a lot of work. yes sometimes it was hard. but he helped with any questions you had and you were given a week - 2 weeks to finish the assignments. but i loved the class, i guess because i love computers and he was a helpful teacher and we had fun!
he assigned unnecessary work and he\'s very boring.

Easy "A"! He goes over the exercises in the book for 2 or 3 days, gives you a sheet with the homework (which is what he\'s spent class going over), and gives you the nest 2 or 3 class days to work on it, then you take the test. If you study the practice quizzes you will make an "A." That is where he takes all the test questions from.
